name: part_009
file: tmp_【#冥ハロ2025】白上フブキ生誕３DLIVE「冥界Halloween Night!」【白上フブキ⧸ホロライブ】 [7Tm7dVsTPBk]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Intro animation with comic book style visuals featuring Fubuki, Mio, and Polka.
Performance of the song 'Kyoushou Tricksters' (Crazy Laughter Tricksters).
Serious narrative section with sketchbook visuals.
Intro to the next song 'Necro no Hanayome'.

subtitles.original: トリック・オア・トリート！
subtitles.english: Trick or Treat!

subtitles.original: お菓子をくれてもイタズラはしちゃうよ！
subtitles.english: Even if you give me candy, I'm gonna play a trick on you anyway!

subtitles.original: ようこそeveryone 皆の肝揺らすこのSpooky night
subtitles.english: Welcome everyone, to this spooky night that'll shake your nerves.

subtitles.original: 腹の底まで響く kick & bass & hats & trumpet
subtitles.english: Kick & bass & hats & trumpet resonating deep in your gut.

subtitles.original: ランランとswingin' beat 赤い靴で踊り狂えば
subtitles.english: With a bright swingin' beat, if you dance madly in red shoes,

subtitles.original: 浮世の憂いなど今は忘れられるでしょ
subtitles.english: You can forget the sorrows of this fleeting world for now, right?

subtitles.original: 虐げられちまったじゃ オバケよりも怖い人達
subtitles.english: People are scarier than ghosts, having been oppressed by them.

subtitles.original: 笛吹いちゃってすぐに 1out, 2out, 3... Knock out!!
subtitles.english: Blow the whistle and it's instantly 1 out, 2 out, 3... Knock out!!

subtitles.original: コンプライアンスも厳しめの世の中でスラ
subtitles.english: Even in a world with strict compliance rules,

subtitles.original: 恐怖のリライト請け負います
subtitles.english: We'll undertake a rewrite of your fear.

subtitles.original: GIVE ME A CHERRY PIE
subtitles.english: GIVE ME A CHERRY PIE

subtitles.original: それとも may I choke you up?
subtitles.english: Or perhaps, may I choke you up?

subtitles.original: GIVE ME A FLOWY DRESS
subtitles.english: GIVE ME A FLOWY DRESS

subtitles.original: それとも may I stab you to death?
subtitles.english: Or perhaps, may I stab you to death?

subtitles.original: Poison, rope, rotten cake, knife, scissors... what we play?
subtitles.english: Poison, rope, rotten cake, knife, scissors... what we play?

subtitles.original: choose one... choose one... choose one... choose one...
subtitles.english: choose one... choose one... choose one... choose one...

subtitles.original: さぁ選んで？
subtitles.english: Come on, choose.

subtitles.original: なんちってドッキリ大成功 響くパンパカパンファンファーレで
subtitles.english: Just kidding! Huge prank success! With a resounding fan-pa-ka-pan fanfare,

subtitles.original: にっこり笑っちゃってハイピース
subtitles.english: Smile brightly and say 'Peace'!

subtitles.original: あー怖かったななんて 座り込んで涙目で
subtitles.english: "Ah, that was so scary," you say, sitting down with teary eyes.

subtitles.original: 笑う顔みたいな
subtitles.english: I want to see that laughing face.

subtitles.original: ちっちゃな箱の中の モンスターに怯えるくらいなら
subtitles.english: If you're going to be frightened by a monster in a small box,

subtitles.original: いつだってここにおいで
subtitles.english: Come here anytime.

subtitles.original: もっとずっと本能的で 楽しくなれる
subtitles.english: You can become much more instinctive and have fun.

subtitles.original: 恐怖と踊っちゃおうぜ
subtitles.english: Let's dance with fear!

subtitles.original: 相想的に適当キマってカタルシス
subtitles.english: Relatively appropriately high on catharsis.

subtitles.original: もういっちょ感情ジェットコースターで ご機嫌デトックス
subtitles.english: One more time, a good-mood detox on an emotional roller coaster.

subtitles.original: Uh oh...
subtitles.english: Uh oh...

subtitles.original: 満月が暴く醜悪な本性
subtitles.english: The full moon exposes your ugly true nature.

subtitles.original: デタラメに杖振り回し Hocus Pocus
subtitles.english: Swinging the wand randomly, Hocus Pocus.

subtitles.original: 劣等感を苗床に育つ妄想を
subtitles.english: Do you know the way to pluck the delusions

subtitles.original: 摘み取る術を知ってるかい
subtitles.english: that grow in the seedbed of inferiority?

subtitles.original: 迷える哀れな子羊たちよ
subtitles.english: Oh, lost pitiful lambs...

subtitles.original: お菓子が欲しいかい？
subtitles.english: Do you want candy?

subtitles.original: それとも安らぎが欲しいかい？
subtitles.english: Or do you want peace?

subtitles.original: 永遠に求め続けるの？
subtitles.english: Will you keep seeking it forever?

subtitles.original: それならばずっと苦しいままだ
subtitles.english: If so, you will remain in pain forever.

subtitles.original: 恐怖からの解放によって
subtitles.english: If there is salvation to be found

subtitles.original: 成し得る救済があるのならば
subtitles.english: through liberation from fear...

subtitles.original: この目隠しはそのままに
subtitles.english: Leave this blindfold as it is.

subtitles.original: さあ イタズラ完了
subtitles.english: Now, trick complete.

subtitles.original: 永遠に断ち切れない 呪いの鎖に囚われ
subtitles.english: Trapped in a cursed chain that can never be severed,

subtitles.original: 朽ち果ててしまう前に
subtitles.english: Before you completely rot away...

subtitles.original: 脳みそちょっと弄るだけね あら不思議
subtitles.english: Just fiddling with your brain a little, oh how mysterious.

subtitles.original: こんなに気持ち良くて 気分爽快
subtitles.english: It feels so good and refreshing like this!

subtitles.original: なんちってドッキリ大成功 響くパンパカパンファンファーレで
subtitles.english: Just kidding! Huge prank success! With a resounding fan-pa-ka-pan fanfare,

subtitles.original: にっこり笑っちゃってハイポーズ
subtitles.english: Smile brightly and strike a pose!

subtitles.original: あー辛かったななんて へたり込んで涙目で
subtitles.english: "Ah, that was so tough," you say, collapsing with teary eyes.

subtitles.original: 笑う顔っていいな
subtitles.english: Laughing faces are nice.

subtitles.original: もしも死にたくて いいよこんなに頑張ったんだから
subtitles.english: If you want to die, it's okay. You've worked so hard, after all.

subtitles.original: ためらわずこっちにおいで
subtitles.english: Don't hesitate, come over here.

subtitles.original: もうずっと本能的で 気持ちいいだけの
subtitles.english: Just being instinctive and feeling good forever,

subtitles.original: 悪夢を見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show you a nightmare.

subtitles.original: 困窮極まってこそ光るカタルシス
subtitles.english: Catharsis that shines only when destitution is extreme.

subtitles.original: もういっちょ因果全リセットで 魂デトックス
subtitles.english: One more time, reset all karma for a soul detox.

subtitles.original: Uh oh...
subtitles.english: Uh oh...

subtitles.original: いつかの、あったかもしれない世界の出来事までをも、
subtitles.english: Even the events of a world that might have existed someday...

subtitles.original: この冥界ではこうして思念として漂っているんだね
subtitles.english: Drift here in this underworld as thoughts like this.

subtitles.original: あまり深入りしてはいけないよ、こういうのが一番タチが悪い
subtitles.english: Don't go too deep. These kinds are the nastiest.

subtitles.original: 私はただ、あなたを愛していただけ
subtitles.english: "I was just loving you."

subtitles.original: 物言わぬ唇に生気を吹き込んで
subtitles.english: Breathing life into silent lips,

subtitles.original: 今宵「あなた」は甦る、あの頃の姿で。
subtitles.english: Tonight "you" will revive, in the form of those days.
